biography: Erik, a familiar face from Ruukkigolf, brings a quiet intensity to the greens. Known for his meticulous approach to the game, Erik has participated in the Hector Trophée on two occasions. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the individual Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, his dedication to the sport remains unwavering.

Off the course, Erik is known for his thoughtful demeanor and sharp wit, making him a popular figure among fellow competitors. Although he will not be competing in Hector Trophée 2025, his presence is sure to be missed. His focus and strategic prowess make him a formidable player to watch in future events.
